channel.title: Halo 2
channel.description: I've had the game since it came out and i now play it on my 360. i was wondering how i can connect to xbox live and all. i havent even hooked up the ethernet cable to the 360 yet. can anyone tell me how to hook up xbox live for my 360 :confused:

item.title: Halo 2
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Windows Live account is an account you use for every Windows Website, it connects everyone together, from Xbox users to Computer users, Microsoft is trying to unify everyone, or so they say. You might as well sign up for one, you’ll need it when Microsoft starts a one world government.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 2
item.dc:creator: @zac129 zac129
item.description:
@zac129 wrote:

if u bot the 360 premium (white box) then just hook the ethernet cabel up tto the internet, then on the yellow (xbox live )tab in the 360 dashboard pick “sign upfor xbox live” (i dont know exactly wat it says) then just follow the steps to sign up… after all that is done pop in halo2 while (while signed in on the dashboard to xbox live) and then sign in as anybody on ur halo 2game note:the profiles on halo 2 will be different from the ones on ur 360…then sign in as the gamertag that u picked for xbox live…0 and to get xbox live u must have a windows live account. if u got ne questions just respond to this.

Read full topic
